name: Nordic Growth
overview:
Nordic Growth is a professional investor combining experience with a recognised academic framework to help outstanding Nordic companies seeking international growth, partnering with investors seeking extraordinary opportunities in the Nordic region.

Their investment professionals have operative and board-level experience from private and listed companies. The expertise and functional experience includes strategy evaluation, formation and implementation, corporate management, sales, marketing and product management.

The team has an impressive record in financial structuring, valuations, and sell and buy â€“side mergers and acquisitions. They provide also fee-based services in these areas as well as fundraising.
